閬.definition: (literary) vast; spacious; (literary) lofty; (literary) tall door; (literary) dry moat outside a city wall

閬中.definition: see 閬中市|阆中市[Lang4zhong1 Shi4]

閬中市.definition: Langzhong, county-level city in Nanchong 南充市[Nan2chong1 Shi4], Sichuan

閬苑.definition: Langyuan paradise, home of the immortals in verse and legends
